page.title: 17MY DAY
page.content: In the morning my radio wakes me up .I get dressed and go downstairs to have my breakfast. I have cornflakes and fruit juice. Then I go upstairs to comb my hair and clean my teeth.When I have my shoes and coat on,my mum,my sister and I get in the car. We drive to school. I walk into the playground.If it is ten to nine I go into the cloakroom where I change my shoes. I take my things out of my bag and take my coat off,then I go into the classroom and sit in my chair to listen for the register. Then its time for assembly. When we come out we sit on the carpet and listen to what we have to do. It is usually maths or English. After about an hour we go outside to play. When we come back in we swap subjects, then before dinner we go to wash our hands. (cont.P18)
